programme.title: Arthur's Whisky
programme.desc: When Joan's husband dies, she discovers he'd invented an anti-aging elixir that literally takes the years off. Sharing it with her friends Linda and Susan, the rejuvenated women waste little time in painting the town red, but they soon realise it's a very different world to the one they remember. programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 3
programme.desc: Following the death of her father Gus, Toula Portokalos honours his dying wish to take the entire family to his childhood village and reconnect with their Greek roots. Toula's husband Ian joins the madcap expedition along with extended family including her brother Nick and Aunt Voula. programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: Bea and Ben enjoy an incredible first date, but attraction quickly burns out and they are delighted to be apart. However, fate compels the duo to reconsider, and they seize the opportunity to attend a lavish wedding in Australia, as a couple. The pair pretend to be deliriously in love during the once-in-a-lifetime trip and keep up appearances in front of other guests. programme.title: Sumotherhood
programme.desc: Riko and best friend Kane bungle the robbery of a local bank, causing one of the customers, hard man Leo Demarco, to suffer a heart attack. Fake news spreads that Leo is dead and Shotti, leader of one of East London's toughest firms, recruits Riko and Kane in gratitude for killing a rival. programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.sub-title: Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Action, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 15
programme.desc: Police detective Danny Rourke is haunted by the abduction of his seven-year-old daughter Minnie from a park. Evidence leads to a psychic Diana Cruz, who introduces the cop to the unseen world of hypnotics - people with the ability to control how we perceive the world. programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: According to legend, Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase and for hundreds of years the nobleman's ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. American patriarch Hiram B Otis moves from Boston into the country pile with his clan. Daughter Virginia makes her displeasure about the move clear and she forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to America. programme.title: The Exorcist: Believer
programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. The duo recruit self-doubting sorcerer Simon and incorrigible rogue Forge to their merry gang. A plan to steal the fabled Scroll of Reawakening backfires and Edgin is incarcerated with Holga on charges of grand larceny and skulduggery. programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. programme.title: Kinky Boots
programme.desc: Comedy drama based on a true story, starring Joel Edgerton and Chiwetel Ejiofor. Charlie Price inherits an ailing Northampton shoe factory when his father dies. After a chance encounter with drag queen Lola, Charlie is convinced the only way out is to produce reinforced heels for transvestites. programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: Wartime comedy starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey. While scratching around Kuwait in search of a story about the Iraq war, reporter Bob Wilton meets Lyn Cassady, who claims to be a member of an experimental military unit that uses psychic powers to read the enemy's thoughts, can pass through solid walls and even kill a goat by staring at it. programme.desc: During the final weeks of the most consequential presidential election campaign in US history, America is poised to elect either its first female president or finally break the country's two-party gridlock with its first viable independent candidate. Eli is pursuing a story about budget cuts and by following the money, she and Booker uncover a financial conspiracy that places the fate of the election, the country, and democracy in their hands. programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Unfortunately, he hasn't secured a place on the official British Royal Legion trip to France to the commemorate the 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings. Bernie needs to make the trip to Normandy for personal reasons, and with Rene's blessing, he sneaks off to pay his respects. programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.desc: Saturday Night Football sees an out-of-form Brentford visit the Emirates for a Premier League brawl with Arsenal. Can the hosts pick up another vital three points in the title race? (09.03).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Labelled title contenders, Aston Villa's transformation hit new heights in the week as Unai Emery's side face another contender in the form of Arsenal on Saturday Night Football. (09.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Saturday Night Football sees Champions League-chasing Aston Villa welcome local rivals Wolves to Villa Park, with the visitors looking for back-to-back Premier League wins. (30.03).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Saturday Night Football comes from the south coast, as the champions Manchester City arrive at Bournemouth's Vitality Stadium for this Premier League clash. (24.02).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: After a humbling trip to the Etihad, Saturday Night Football sees Bournemouth face Newcastle at the Vitality. A tense affair saw the Magpies beat Arsenal at St James' last week. (11.11).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Still without a Premier League win this campaign, Everton travel to Brentford on Saturday Night Football. The hosts target an immediate response following defeat at Newcastle. (23.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: On a day that could see the Premier League return of Ivan Toney, Nottingham Forest are the visitors at the Gtech Community Stadium as they face Brentford on Saturday Night Football. (20.01).

programme.title: Gary Neville's Soccerbox: Rooney
programme.desc: Gary Neville sits down with former teammate Wayne Rooney to chat through some of the most memorable matches from across their trophy-laden careers.

programme.title: SSN Euro Matchday
programme.desc: A look ahead to the day's matches from UEFA EURO 2024, with the latest team news and interviews ahead of the action.

programme.title: SSN Euro Matchday

programme.title: Class Of 92: Full Time
programme.desc: As the transfer window opens, Salford's owners look to bring in new faces to provide fresh impetus to their promotion bid. (2 of 3).

programme.title: PL Retro: Chelsea v Burnley 2017
programme.desc: Look back to the opening weekend of the 2017-18 season as champions Chelsea got underway against Burnley. It would be a disastrous start to their title defence.

programme.title: Chelsea: PL Years 2009/10
programme.desc: Take a look back at an enthralling 2009-2010 campaign in the Premier League, as Carlo Ancelotti and Ray Wilkins guided Chelsea to the title on the final day.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Stoke/L'Pool '15
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Stoke City, the 6-1 win over Liverpool on the final day of the 2014-15 season.

programme.title: PL Greatest: N'castle/S'land 2013
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Sunderland, the 3-0 win at rivals Newcastle in 2013, their first there in 13 years.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Swindon/Man Utd 1994
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Swindon Town, the 2-2 draw with Man Utd at the County Ground in March 1994.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Bradford/L'Pool 2000
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 49 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Bradford City, their 1-0 win over Liverpool at Valley Parade in May 2000.

programme.title: Best Premier League Goals 15/16
programme.desc: A look back at some of the best Premier League goals in seasons gone by. Here, take a look at the best strikes from the 2015-16 season, as Leicester stunned the world with their title win.

programme.title: PL 100 Club: Frank Lampard
programme.desc: A celebration of some of the finest goalscorers in Premier League history. Here the focus is on Chelsea record breaker Frank Lampard. Tweet your favourite #pl100club.

programme.title: PL Legends: Van Nistelrooy
programme.desc: A profile of former Manchester United striker Ruud van Nistelrooy. The Dutchman scored 95 goals in 150 appearances for the Red Devils before moving to Real Madrid.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Man U/L'Pool '10
programme.desc: A look back at some classic matches in the Premier League. Here, Manchester United meet Liverpool in 2010, with a Dimitar Berbatov hat-trick proving the difference between the two teams.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Man U/L'Pool '14
programme.desc: A look back at some classic matches in the Premier League. Here, Man United host Liverpool in March 2014 in a remarkable contest that saw the visitors awarded three penalties.

programme.title: PL Greatest : Chelsea/Man Utd 2012
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, rewind to 2012 for a memorable, ill-tempered clash between high-flying Chelsea and Man Utd at Stamford Bridge.

programme.title: PL Greatest : Man Utd/Chelsea 2014
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, rewind to 2014 for a pulsating encounter between Manchester United and Chelsea at Old Trafford.

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: On Saturday Night Football, Brighton and Newcastle target instant Premier League responses, with the Seagulls losing to West Ham and the Magpies going down to a 10-man Liverpool. (02.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: On Saturday Night Football, Sean Dyche is back at Turf Moor in the Everton dugout as he pits his team - who have three wins from three - against Burnley in the Premier League. (16.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The Super Bowl champions Kansas City Chiefs head to the Buffalo Bills for an AFC divisional round matchup. The Chiefs' Patrick Mahomes stars in his first playoff game on the road. (21.01).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Nakatani v..
programme.desc: Efe Ajagba and Joe Goodall meet in a 10-round heavyweight main event. With a record of 18 wins and one loss, Ajagba is out to avenge his 2014 Commonwealth Games defeat to Goodall. (04.11).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Nakatani v..
programme.desc: Emanuel Navarrete faces Liam Wilson for the vacant WBO world junior lightweight championship. Navarrete is looking to become a three-weight world champion with a win. (03.02).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: Los Angeles Chargers meet an AFC North-leading Baltimore Ravens during week 12. Baltimore secured victory in a big divisional match-up previously, dispatching the Bengals 34-20. (26.11).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Boosted by victory in their Super Bowl rematch with Kansas City, the Eagles are back at Lincoln Financial Field for week 12. Their opponents, Buffalo, routed the Jets last week. (26.11).

programme.title: Morales v Barrera 2000
programme.desc: The first in a trilogy of fights between the two, re-watch the celebrated Erik Morales and Marco Antonio Barrera match up, with both the WBC and WBO super bantamweight titles on the line.

programme.title: Mayweather v Ndou 2003
programme.desc: Defending his lightweight crown, Floyd Mayweather Jr shared the canvas with Phillip N'dou at the Van Andel Arena in Grand Rapids, Michigan, during the winter of 2003.

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The NFC East-leading Philadelphia Eagles, who improved to 7-1 last week, look to extend their winning run to three as they host Dallas. The 5-2 Cowboys trail the Eagles in second. (05.11).

programme.title: Fight Night: Jonas v Mayer
programme.desc: Putting her IBF world welterweight championship on the line, Natasha Jonas steps inside the ring with former unified world champion Mikaela Mayer at the M&S Bank Arena in Liverpool. (20.01).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The New York Jets and Aaron Rodgers get their regular season underway at MetLife Stadium as the Buffalo Bills roll into town. The Jets haven't made the NFL playoffs since 2010. (11.09).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Inoue v Dasmarinas
programme.desc: Japan's electric power puncher and pound for pound star Naoya Inoue defends his bantamweight world titles against Michael Dasmarinas in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)

programme.desc: A look back at some classic darts action. Here, Michael 'Mighty Mike' van Gerwen faces 'Jackpot' Adrian Lewis in the quarter-finals of the 2013 PDC World Darts Championship.

programme.title: LIVE: World Matchplay Darts D2 S2
programme.desc: The evening session on day two of the 2024 World Matchplay, taking place at Winter Gardens in Blackpool. (14.07).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Alimkhanuly..
programme.desc: Competing outside of his native homeland for the first time, New Zealand's Andrei Mikhailovich challenges Janibek Alimkhanuly in Las Vegas for the IBF and WBO middleweight titles. (14.07).

programme.title: World Matchplay Darts D2 S1
programme.desc: The afternoon session on day two of the 2024 World Matchplay, taking place at Winter Gardens in Blackpool. (14.07).

programme.title: Wade v Thornton: Wld Grand Prix 14
programme.desc: Revisit an incredible match at the 2014 World Grand Prix of Darts, as James Wade and Robert Thornton both hit nine-darters during their round two meeting. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: MVG v Wade: Premier Lge 2015
programme.desc: Revisit a classic Premier League Darts contest from the Motorpoint Arena where Michael Van Gerwen dismantled James Wade in 2015 with an average of 116.90. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: Taylor v Wright 2017
programme.desc: Appearing for the final time on the Winter Gardens stage, revisit Phil Taylor's World Matchplay Final with Peter Wright in 2017. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: Beaton v Taylor QF 2010
programme.desc: In the quarter-final of the 2010 Grand Slam of Darts, Steve Beaton staged an incredible comeback, overcoming Phil Taylor. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Stevenson v..
programme.desc: Arguably boxing's next great superstar, Shakur Stevenson returns to his hometown of Newark to tackle Olympic gold medallist Robson Conceicao. (23.09).

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Barboza v Zorrilla
programme.desc: The main event spotlight shines upon Arnold Barboza Jr and Danielito Zorrilla as the two unbeaten super-lightweights enter the squared circle for ten rounds of boxing. (16.07).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The 5-2 Detroit Lions host the 3-4 Las Vegas Raiders in week eight of the NFL. The NFC North leaders Detroit were bested last week by a Lamar Jackson-inspired Baltimore Ravens. (30.10).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Loma v Kambosos
programme.desc: In his quest to recapture a world title, Ukraine's legendary Vasiliy Lomachenko travels to Perth to face Australia's George Kambosos for the vacant IBF lightweight championship. (12.05).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: A game from week 10 of the 2023 NFL featuring the NFC North-leading Detroit Lions on the road to Los Angeles Chargers. The Charges began the week by rolling past the New York Jets. (12.11).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Foster v Nova
programme.desc: The Theater at Madison Square Garden sets the scene for a WBC super-featherweight title defence, as the champion O'Shaquie Foster goes toe to toe with Abraham Nova for 12 rounds. (17.02).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Monday Night Football action from the NFL, as week 13 of the season pits Trevor Lawrence and the Jacksonville Jaguars against the 5-6 Cincinnati Bengals. The Jags lead AFC South. (04.12).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: No longer undefeated this season, the Philadelphia Eagles host the 5-1 Miami Dolphins in week seven of the 2023 NFL. The Eagles lost their perfect record at the Jets last weekend. (22.10).

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Haney v Kambosos 2
programme.desc: Undisputed lightweight champion Devin Haney and George Kambosos meet in their rematch in Melbourne. After Haney's dominant win in the first fight, will it be repeat or revenge? (16.10).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Anderson v Martin
programme.desc: ...Charles Martin. Jared Anderson and Charles Martin main event at the Huntington Center in Toledo, as the pair come together for a 10-round heavyweight bout. (02.07).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The Minnesota Vikings host the Chicago Bears in week 12 of the 2023 NFL. The Vikings enter this one having seen their five-game winning streak come to an end on the road at Denver. (27.11).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The Minnesota Vikings host the Chicago Bears in week 12 of the 2023 NFL. The Vikings enter this one having seen their five-game winning streak come to an end on the road at Denver. (27.11).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The 2-4 Minnesota Vikings host Brock Purdy and the San Francisco 49ers in week seven of the NFL. The previous week marked the end of the Niners' regular-season winning streak of 15. (23.10).

programme.title: LIVE: World Matchplay Darts D3
programme.desc: Day three of the 2024 World Matchplay, taking place at Winter Gardens in Blackpool. (15.07).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24 (15mins)
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as Patrick Mahomes and the Kansas City Chiefs return to the AFC championship game as they face the Ravens in Baltimore. (28.01).

programme.title: Best of NFL (15mins)
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as the San Francisco 49ers and the Detroit Lions advance to the NFC Championship game with a Super Bowl bid on the line. (28.01).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24 (15mins)
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from the opening divisional round matchup during the NFL playoffs, as the Baltimore Ravens host the Houston Texans in the AFC. (20.01).
